document_data.mainbody:
Lelembut''' was one of five broad categories for [[spirit]]s that the [[Bavanese]] people of [[Bawa]] used to describe supernatural encounters. It was used particularly to refer to spirits that were possessing the body of another creature. Depending upon the situation, the category could be applied to almost any spirit.
{{Quote|A lelembut possessed my [[dog]] to eat it!|A typical excuse among Bavanese schoolchildren.}}
